channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mass Immigration, Legal Or Illegal, Is Incompatible With National Survival
item.description: Mass deportation of illegal immigrants is not enough to save America. We have to recover an insistence on assimilation.

item.description: It is important to understand how embarrassing it is for the Washington Post to have to confront the documents Gabbard has released.
